title: Drawing, "Haven: Upholstered Center Seat", October 15, 1936
medium: Graphite, black ink, red color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 8500/F.S./HAVEN, PRIP/OLSSON/10/15/36, 10/20/36, 1, SL.; inscribed in graphite above stamp: WALNUT BASE/MAKE 79 LIKE THIS [crossed out]/MAKE INTO ONE SOFA WITH UNITS 8501; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawings for upholstered center seat with walnut base. Sloping curved back with square seat and frame; low walnut base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Haven: Upholstered Center Seat", October 15, 1936.
October 15, 1936. Graphite, black ink, red color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-991.
